Drosophila overexpressing Gprk2.Authors: Li Chen and Mel B Feany
Drosophila overexpressing Gprk2.Title: Alpha-Synuclein Phosphorylation controls neurotoxicity and inclusion formation in a Drosophila model of Parkinson's disease
Drosophila overexpressing Gprk2.Definition: This transgenic Drosophila coexpresses alpha-synuclein and G protein-coupled recepter kinase (Gprk2).  Overexpression of Gprk2 increases phosphorylation at Ser129 and enhances alpha-synuclein toxicity.
